TEXT.S:
GuatemalaGuatemalau Guatemalasa i labu nu Cong-Nan-Mei-Cuo, itiza i 15 30 N, 90 15 W. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa 108,889 sq km. u ahebal nu lala'ay sa 107,159 sq km, u ahebal nu nanumay sa 1,730 sq km. hamin nu tademaw sa 15,189,958. kakalukan umah sa 41.20%, kilakilangan umah sa 33.60%, zumaay henay umah sa 25.20%. caay kamu cabaya a kanatal nu Taywan. Guatemalai nuteban a Amilikansatipan micapi i waliyu, sawali micapi tu "Cya-Le-Pi-Hay'', saamis malalutin atu "Muo-Si-Ke"", teban nu wali atu amis, malalutin "Pay-Li-Se", teban nu wali atu timu, malalutin tu Hondurasatu El Salvador. (u kamu nu Hulam sa:[1])
tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Guatemala City. tapang tusu nu Guatemalau Guatemala tuse (, Guatemala City) izaw ku 250 a mang a maluay nu tademaw. u satabakiay a tukay nu Guatemala. u tatungusay a midangan izaw ku A-Ti-Te-Lana banaw, satabakiay malumanay a tukay nu ayaway Ma-Yaa tukay Ti-Ka-El, atu u singanganay a tukay, u Ke-Sa-El-Te-Nan-Keatu Ci-Ci-Ka-Su-Te-Nan-Ke. (u kamu nu Hulam sa:""Guatemala City250[2])
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 15 bulad 9 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (cong-tung) ayza sa ci Jimmy Morales, micakat a demiad sa i 2016 a mihca 1 bulad 14 demiad.
kakitizaanGuatemalai nuteban a Amilikanku kakitizaan nu kitakit. i amis enalay a kakitizaan ku Pey-Teni kacaledesan a maudaday a kilangkilangan (akutiay a bukbuklalan kilakilangan, ), u hinaudaday a kakitizaan, i tebanay a kakitiazan, 4200 m ku talakaw silamalay a buyu' i capiay nu waliyu. enalay a kakitiazan u akutiay ku demiad, maipuca sidamekay ku sela. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: ""4200) i Guatemalayadah ku banaw, satabakiay a banaw I-Sa-Wa-El banawi I-Sa-Wa-El kenis, salabungay a banaw i Su-Lu-La kenisnay a A-Ti-Te-Lan banaw. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: """") i tebanay talakaway a kakitizaan sa, u tatebanan nu lalangawan nu Guatemala, u talakaw nu kakitizaan 1300 m tangasa i 1800 m, paminhca a mangay ku demiad 18℃ ~ 28℃ ku diheku nu demiad i satalakaway a kakitizaan, i cacay a bulad atu sakatusa a bulad cuedet ku demiad. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 130018001828) 37 ku silamalay a buyu' nu Guatemalasepat ku mabuwakay hen ayzq. Pa-Ka-Yasilamalay a buyu', Sen-Ti-Ya-Ku-Tu, Hu-Ay-Keatu Ta-Ka-Nasilamalay a buyu'. Hu-Ay-Keatu Pa-Ka-Yasilamalay a buyu', namabuwak i 2010 a mihca, 2018 a mihca maliyaw a mabuwak aca ku Hu-Ay-Kesilamalay a buyu', pinaay a patekenan ku mapatayay atu madukaay. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 37:20102018[3])
likisiLiyen-He-Kuwe-Pin kusiu satabakiay p palumaay tu lusay i Guatemalaizaw aca ku Kuwe-Ci-Tiye-Lua kusi atu cacay dada u picumudan nu balunga. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: "") mapaucul nu way-cyaw-pu nu Amilikaa pasasulaceus tu Guatemalamipaculi tu kung-cangsa ku kamu a mibelin ci A-Pen-Sean (Jacobo Arbenz Guzmán). Cung-Yang-Cin-Paw-Cimasasupadang atu paculiay tu hitay nu Guatemala, mibelin i 1954 a mihca tu Guatemala. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Jacobo Arbenz Guzmán1954) hitay nu Guatemalacayay pitantan a mihemin mipatay tu seselaay a yen-cu-min nu Guatemala, 1982 a mihca siwa a bulad ci Li-Aw-Se-Meng-Teku malasatapangay, 9000 ku nipatayan tu tademaw nu Ma-Ya. 1983 a mihca misulal ku sihu nu Guatemalaa milisapen tu siselaay nu maluay a yencumin, malingatu aca a min-cu-hwa, 1985 mihca paliway a misingkiw. nika kakitaan atu pakuuc cayay ka lecad. ayza 1% dada a tademaw ku sitatudungay tu 60% a sela atu kalisiw nu Guatemala. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 19829·9000198319851%60%[4])
cen-cebaluhay nipatizeng a tatapangan ci Cia-May-Tay (Alejandro Giammattei), kina sepat hen a masadak a misingkiw tu tapang nu kanatal. tabakitu ku mihcaan niza, naw mikuwanay tu salaecusay ku nagnagan pa pilubuan nu Guatemala, sisa malabu na mibulibul tu pilubuan, dihemay kapah ku balucu' niza sakay binawlan. yu malignatu a mala tatapangan, cayay tu ka lecabay tu Venezuela. u mikeliday i kuling nu Amilikahantu nu misakamuay. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Alejandro Giammattei) nika ayza pihacengay micidekay milaliday bala' a imelanga libung palulaccusen ni Cia-May-Tay (Alejandro Giammattei) ci (Donald Trump) a cen-hu. u mabulaway a tademaw patatikuen, pakabiyawen ku sihu nu Guatemalatu libung. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Donald Trump) u ayaw ni Cia-May-Tay (Alejandro Giammattei) a mala tatapangan nu mikeliday ci Mu-La-Ley-Se (Jimmy Morales) malakapah ciniza, ayaw yu malatapang he ciniza u misacuweay tu makemutay, manamet ku cen-ceniza, nika cayay ka kapah aci Alejandro Giammattei mapatizeng ci Cia-May-Tay (Alejandro Giammattei), cayay pisulul a mitakaw a mikaen palawdes tu kalisiw nu binawlan, pabaliwan ayza ci ci Mu-La-Ley-Se (Jimmy Morales) nika kapahen ciniza a tacuwacuwa a midang. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: Jimmy Morales) min-cu-hwanu Guatemala, cayay hen katenes ku demiad, 1996 a mihca kiy masatelep a kuwanen nu hitay. u nikuwanana nuhitay i awaw ku Guatemalasaka sinaadaan ku binawlan, lisapenan kasikinihan ku salangawan lisisi nayza sasakanuwan i lekec nu kanatalAn-Li-Huy. An-Li-HuyCang-Zen-Li-Su-Kuou Chinacayay pisulul nu Guatemalaa pangangan ku Cung-Huwa-Zen-Min-Kung-Hu-Kui lekec nu kanatalsika cacengan nu sananal i matiya. (u kamu nu Hulam sa: 1996[5])
Guatemala
